name: humhub
description: HumHub is a flexible social networking platform that can be used for communities, intranets and collaboration spaces. It offers user profiles, groups, streams, modules and permissions, all running on your own server.
features: Social Networking: Create private social networks for communities, companies, or organizations.
User Profiles: Customizable user profiles with photos, information, and activity streams.
Spaces and Groups: Organize users into spaces with separate content streams and permissions.
Activity Streams: Facebook-style news feeds showing updates from followed users and spaces.
File Sharing: Upload and share files within spaces with version control.
Calendar Integration: Shared calendars for events and meetings within spaces.
Module System: Extend functionality with plugins for polls, wikis, tasks, and more.
Permission Management: Granular control over who can see and do what in each space.
